data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,789,100 souls living in the state of Idaho with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Idaho, United States
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Idaho.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Idaho, United States.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Idaho that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Idaho. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Idaho who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the state of Idaho, United States has a population of 1,789,100.

We estimate Idaho has 472,433 people who might know Jesus, 896,065 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 420,601 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Idaho, United States.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
